trends_data.seasonality_notes: High steady demand throughout year with no major seasonal peaks

demand_score.reasoning: High-end luxury market with excellent CPC values ($6-13 CPC). Private jet owners willing to pay premium prices for superior service. Steady year-round demand with no seasonality issues.

competitive_difficulty.reasoning: Low competition with few specialized private jet detailing providers. Only 3 major competitors with limited review volumes. Opportunity exists for Miami-specific private jet specialist.

local_pack_score.reasoning: Mixed Local Pack with one solid competitor (AeroShine Prestige) but includes unclaimed listing. Opportunity to dominate Miami-specific private jet Local Pack with proper optimization.

content_gap_score.reasoning: Significant content gaps in Miami-specific private jet owner guides, VIP services, charter aircraft programs, and MIA airport accessibility. High opportunity for content differentiation.

keyword_trends_score.reasoning: Excellent steady demand with no seasonal peaks - private jet cleaning needed year-round. High search volumes for general aviation terms create opportunity.

recommendations.rationale: Exceptional private jet detailing opportunity with low competition, high-value customers ($6-13 CPC), and significant content gaps in Miami market.
Steady year-round demand, luxury customer base willing to pay premium prices, and opportunity to become Miami's premier private jet detailing specialist.

local_pack_analysis.analysis: Mix of established competitor (AeroShine Prestige), unclaimed listing, and weaker provider (Prime Appearance). High opportunity for Miami-specific private jet specialist to dominate Local Pack.
